text: Fiorenzo Alfieri (11 September 1943 - 13 December 2020) was an Italian educator and politician. He was born in Polignano a Mare, Italy. He was a member of the Turin City Council from 1995 to 2000. Alfieri died of COVID-19 in Turin on 13 December 2020 at the age of 77.In memoriam Fiorenzo Alfieri Chairman of the Castello di Rivoli ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Italy Category:Politicians from Turin Category:Italian educators
title: Fiorenzo Alfieri
